room_title: Escape room "The Alchemist" by Insomnia Escape Room DC in Washington, D.C.
review: The Alchemist is one of the best escape rooms I have been to (and it's been a lot.) Just go, you won't regret it.

room_title: Escape room "The Alchemist" by Insomnia Escape Room DC in Washington, D.C.
review: We did the alchemist room. The clues were clever, the room was surprising and we escaped with thirty seconds to spare! This was my first one and I would highly recommend. I hope to return to Insomnia Escape Room to try another.

room_title: Escape room "The Alchemist" by Insomnia Escape Room DC in Washington, D.C.
review: So much fun! My whole family had a blast. The alchemy room was well thought out challenging, and extremely creative. This was our first escape room. I will definitely be coming back for more. Thanks for a great evening!

room_title: Escape room "The Alchemist" by Insomnia Escape Room DC in Washington, D.C.
review: This was our first escape room ever and we are hooked. We did The Alchemist room, which was incredible... challenging and fun. Everything was of excellent quality... the room, props, etc. And the staff was extremely personable and helpful.We will be back!

room_title: Escape room "The Alchemist" by Insomnia Escape Room DC in Washington, D.C.
review: One of my favorite Escape Rooms I have played. We did the Alchemist room and it was really awesome. I highly recommend it as one of the top games in the D.C./NOVA area. Played it as the second part of a double header coming from another companies big expensive room right down the street. Insomnia blew them away in terms of game quality.
